import * as React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './nav_bar.css'; export default function Navbar(props:any){ let VarEN:string = '', VarDE:string = '' let StoreLang:any = localStorage.getItem('LangSel'); if(StoreLang === 'DE'){ VarDE='block' VarEN='none' } else { VarEN='block' VarDE='none' } const [EN,SetEN] = React.useState(VarEN); const [DE,SetDE] = React.useState(VarDE); const ChngDE=()=>{ SetEN('none') SetDE('block') props.onUpdate('DE') localStorage.setItem('LangSel','DE') } const ChngEN=()=>{ SetDE('none') SetEN('block') props.onUpdate('EN') localStorage.setItem('LangSel','EN') } return (
